Package co.lokblok.toughkeylib

Class ToughkeyBase

java.lang.Object
co.lokblok.toughkeylib.ToughkeyBase
public class ToughkeyBase extends Object
Manages NFC and USB communication with Toughkey devices. This class allows callbacks to be set for detecting and accessing Toughkey devices.

  • Constructor Details

    • ToughkeyBase

      public ToughkeyBase(android.app.Activity activity, int flags)
      Constructs a new ToughkeyBase instance.
      Parameters:
      activity - The activity context.
      flags - Flags indicating supported interfaces (USB/NFC).

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if there are active callbacks.
      Returns:
      true if there are active callbacks, false otherwise.

    • onResume

      public void onResume()
      Resumes NFC and USB operations when the activity is brought back to the foreground. This ensures that NFC foreground dispatch is re-enabled and USB event listeners are active.

    • onPause

      public void onPause()
      Pauses NFC and USB operations when the activity goes into the background. This disables NFC foreground dispatch and unregisters USB event listeners to optimize resource usage.

    • onNewIntent

      public void onNewIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
      Handles NFC intents and USB detection when a new intent is received.
      Parameters:
      intent - The intent containing NFC or USB data.

    • onDestroy

      public void onDestroy()
      Performs cleanup operations when the activity is being destroyed. This method shuts down the executor service, clears callbacks, unregisters the USB receiver (if applicable), and deinitializes NFC support. Ensures that resources are properly released to prevent memory leaks.

    • addCallback

      public void addCallback(ToughkeyBase.ToughkeyCallback callback)
      Registers a callback to handle Toughkey-related events such as detection, timeouts, and errors.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback instance to be registered.

    • removeCallback

      public void removeCallback(ToughkeyBase.ToughkeyCallback callback)
      Unregisters a previously registered Toughkey callback.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback instance to be removed.
